PATCH /zones/{zone_id}/token_validation/.description:
Edit token validation rules.

A request can update multiple Token Validation Rules.

Rules can be re-ordered using the `position` field.

Returns all updated rules.

POST /zones/{zone_id}/token_validation/r.description:
Preview operations covered by a Token Validation rule.

The API will return all operations on a zone annotated with an additional `state` field.
Operations with an `included` `state` will be covered by a Token Validation Rule.

externalDocs.description: Learn more about JSON Web Tokens Validation.

parameters.description: Maximum number of results per page.
parameters.name: per_page

items.description:
Details how `selector` interacted with an operation:
  - `included` operations are included by `selector` and will be covered by the Token Validation Rule
  - `excluded` operations are excluded by `selector` and will not be covered by the Token Validation Rule
  - `ignored` operations are not included by `selector` and will not be covered by the Token Validation Rule
The HTTP method used to access the endpoint.

parameters.description: Filter operations by endpoint. Allows substring matching.
parameters.name: endpoint

items.description: The endpoint which can contain path parameter templates in curly braces, each will be replaced from left to right with {varN}, starting with {var1}, during insertion. This will further be Cloudflare-normalized upon insertion. See: https://developers.cloudflare.com/rules/normalization/how-it-works/.

schema.description:
Select operations covered by this rule.

For details on selectors, see the [Cloudflare Docs](https://developers.cloudflare.com/api-shield/security/jwt-validation/).

exclude.description: Ignore operations that were otherwise included by `include`.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service.

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results.

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results.

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters.

available_hosts.description: All hostnames on zone used by operations

endpoint.description: The endpoint which can contain path parameter templates in curly braces, each will be replaced from left to right with {varN}, starting with {var1}, during insertion. This will further be Cloudflare-normalized upon insertion. See: https://developers.cloudflare.com/rules/normalization/how-it-works/.

method.description: The HTTP method used to access the endpoint.

state.description:
Details how `selector` interacted with an operation:
  - `included` operations are included by `selector` and will be covered by the Token Validation Rule
  - `excluded` operations are excluded by `selector` and will not be covered by the Token Validation Rule
  - `ignored` operations are not included by `selector` and will not be covered by the Token Validation Rule

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.
